title: WATCH: Premier League saves of the round
description: Take a look at the finest saves from the latest round of fixtures in the Premier League.
content: Ben Foster was understandably kept busy during West Brom's defeat at Manchester City but things could have been worse if it was not for two great saves at the Etihad.It was a superb night for Spurs who were in the lead after just 11 seconds and they did not let Manchester United get back into the game thanks to Hugo Lloris.Tom Heaton is close to returning to fitness but he will struggle to oust Nick Pope who was in fine form at Newcastle, save wonderfully from Kenedy.Wayne Hennessey ensured Crystal Palace left the London Stadium with a point on Tuesday night.There are few more satisfying feelings than defeating your old club, as Lukasz Fabianski can testify after playing a key role in Swansea's win over Arsenal.Hit the video above to watch the saves
